short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Follow your friends on a Leetcode leaderboard

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
𝙄𝙈𝙋𝙊𝙍𝙏𝘼𝙉𝙏 - 𝘗𝘭𝘦𝘢𝘴𝘦 𝘳𝘦𝘢𝘥 𝘵𝘩𝘦 𝘶𝘴𝘢𝘨𝘦 𝘪𝘯𝘴𝘵𝘳𝘶𝘤𝘵𝘪𝘰𝘯𝘴 𝘣𝘦𝘧𝘰𝘳𝘦 𝘶𝘴𝘪𝘯𝘨 𝘵𝘩𝘦 𝘦𝘹𝘵𝘦𝘯𝘴𝘪𝘰𝘯

Leetboard is an open-source chrome extension that allows you to track and follow your friends' progress on LeetCode. It acts as a leaderboard, providing insights into the number of questions your friends have solved, categorized by difficulty level (easy, medium, hard).

𝗜𝗻𝘀𝘁𝗮𝗹𝗹𝗮𝘁𝗶𝗼𝗻 
Install the extension through the chrome extension available here, or through the available Github link. 

𝗨𝘀𝗮𝗴𝗲 𝗶𝗻𝘀𝘁𝗿𝘂𝗰𝘁𝗶𝗼𝗻𝘀
Click on the extension, and wait for a few seconds for the extension to fetch data from their profiles on Leetcode.
> To add friends: Write the Leetcode ID of your friends given in the Leetcode profile URL (such as https://leetcode.com/hello, here 'hello' is the Leetcode ID of your friend) onto the input bar and add your friend
> To delete your friend: Simply click on the bar showing your friends statistics
> To clear all your friends from store: Simply click on the 'Delete storage' option to remove all your friends at one
